CustomField.formula: IF(OR( RecordType.Name = 'User Provisioning', RecordType.Name = 'User Deactivation'), RecordType.Name & ' ' & First_Name__c & ' ' & Last_Name__c & User_to_be_deactivated__r.FirstName & ' ' & User_to_be_deactivated__r.LastName , Subject__c )
CustomField.label: Subject for ListView
